Name: Pachi Pachi On A Roll
About the game: Join Fujiko and Robin, two thieves, risking all (including their clothes) to ruin the bank of the biggest 4 casinos in Money City. Dress up for the occasion, complete all missions, fight giant UFOs, defeat dragons, and rob a train, to get the highest score possible in this fun mix of pachinko and pinball. Features: Arcade design. More than 32 missions to complete. Different machines (Casino, Western, Sci-fi, medieval). Minigames 8 different dresses
